name: Simple Restrict Content
author: TaxarPro

sections.description:
Restrict the content of all WordPress, just select the roles that can access that post, page, custom post type, product … etc.

A very lightweight plugin to restrict posts even WooCommerce products.

Not much more to say, leave your review ðŸ™‚

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the â€˜Pluginsâ€™ screen in WordPress

sections.faq:
How configure

On each post, page or custom post type an option is available to select the roles that will have access to that post, page, or custom content type.

Work with WooCommerce?

YES!
